reviews.text:
Jurong West ActiveSG Sports Complex is a gem in the heart of Singapore's western region. Perfectly equipped to cater to a wide range of fitness and recreational needs, it offers a welcoming environment for people of all ages and fitness levels.

One of the highlights of this sports complex is its state-of-the-art swimming pool. With clean and well-maintained facilities, including a kids’ pool, lap pool, and a wading pool, it’s a haven for swimmers and families looking for a refreshing day out. The lifeguards are attentive, ensuring safety for all.

Fitness enthusiasts will appreciate the well-equipped gym, featuring modern machines and spacious workout areas. The atmosphere is conducive to achieving fitness goals, with friendly staff always ready to assist. Additionally, the complex offers a variety of group classes such as yoga, Zumba, and aqua aerobics, catering to a wide range of interests.

The sports halls are another standout feature, accommodating sports like badminton, basketball, and table tennis. These facilities are well-maintained and ideal for friendly games or competitive events. The running tracks and outdoor spaces further enhance the appeal of the complex.

Accessibility is another advantage, with ample parking and proximity to public transport. The affordable entry fees and ActiveSG credits make it a cost-effective option for families and individuals alike.

Overall, Jurong West ActiveSG Sports Complex combines excellent facilities with a vibrant community atmosphere, making it a top choice for sports and recreation in Singapore. A visit here is always a rewarding experience!

Played badminton there a few times. It has more than 10 courts to book. The courts are not super stuffy. Although courts near the doors might be an issue as you might need to keep closing them properly when people come in and leave the door open

It's really great to have a stadium close to where you live and use it for exercise. For seniors, this is perfect. Get a morning jog/walk in with many other seniors doing various exercises. And after cooling down, walk to the nearest hawker center for your favorite breakfast.
For national day celebrations, this stadium is also used for fireworks.
Facilities are old and could be improved and renovated. Toilets flooded with water. Otherwise sufficient space and height for badminton.

So what if the facilities are there but the aircon not switched on! It was such an unpleasant experience watching the competition! Yet u still want to encourage sports in the younger generation!!! With climate change on the rise! this weather is very very unpleasant to have an under 12 vball competition!
